entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 11:47 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -25.3°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
